sentence: Jones and other federal judges have been reluctant to order last-minute changes, noting that the Supreme Court has repeatedly said federal judges shouldn't alter rules on the eve of an election.? In the months preceding the 2018 election, Abrams, a Democrat, accused her Republican opponent in the governor's race, then-Secretary of State Brian Kemp, of using his position as Georgia's chief elections officer to promote voter suppression, an allegation Kemp has vehemently denied.
author: Associated Press
title: Accused shooter in Lady Gaga dog theft mistakenly freed
